cells

Class CallbackManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • cells.CallbackManager

  • public class CallbackManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class for cells that triggers update events related to the life cycle of the cell, such as death or divisibility.

    Created by dbborens on 2/21/14.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CallbackManager(Cell cell, LayerManager layerManager) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void die()
      Signals to the LayerManager that the callback cell is dead and should be removed from the simulation.
      LayerManager getLayerManager() 
      Coordinate getMyLocation() 
      void refreshDivisibility()
      Signals to the LayerManager that the callback cell may have changed its divisibility status and should be checked.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public void die()
        Signals to the LayerManager that the callback cell is dead and should be removed from the simulation.

      • refreshDivisibility

        public void refreshDivisibility()
        Signals to the LayerManager that the callback cell may have changed its divisibility status and should be checked.
